bind.jr:constraintMsg: Patient must be a female of child bearing age

bind.calculate: concat( concat( /anc_visit_follow_up/patient_age_in_years , if( /anc_visit_follow_up/patient_age_in_years =1,' year and ',' years and ')), concat( /anc_visit_follow_up/patient_age_in_months mod 12, if(( /anc_visit_follow_up/patient_age_in_months mod 12)=1,' month old',' months old')) )

input.label: Encourage to go for her ANC clinics in order to ensure that she and her baby are healthy and to plan for her delivery.

item.label: Accompany the mother to the facility

input.label: Date when will go to the health facility

select1.label: Does the woman use a long-lasting insecticidal net (LLIN)?

input.label: Sleeping under a LLIN EVERY night prevents malaria.

select1.label: Has the woman been tested for HIV in the past 3 months?
Has the woman received any Tetanus Toxoid (TT) immunizations during this pregnancy?

input.label: Immunizing with at least two doses of tetanus toxoid before or during pregnancy protects the newborn for the first few weeks of life and protects the mother.
Women can receive up to two TT vaccines per pregnancy. After five TT vaccines, they are vaccinated for life.
